EmailTemplate.name: BMC and Turbonomic - an infrastructure efficiency story (1494353014.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: BMC and Turbonomic - an infrastructure efficiency story (1494353014.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Ainsworth, With the large investment in BMC’s ITSM platforms that your team have made at VITAS, I wanted to send you along a video that shows you why BMC has chosen to implement Turbonomic across every layer of their infrastructure and now even resells the platform with its suite of ITSM tools. Cloud Economics with BMC | A Turbonomic Success Story <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/videos/cloud-economics-on-prem-or-off-with-turbonomic-bmc/]]> With Turbonomic the BMC infrastructure team has been able to increase application performance internally while also enabling them to increase the overall efficiency of their on-premise infrastructure by 25%. I was hoping that the video above might arise enough interest from you so that you would be open to an introduction to Turbonomic to see if it can provide similar benefits to you and the team at VITAS. If so, please let me know and I would be happy to arrange a time that is best for you. I promise to respect your time and process for reviewing new platforms if you so choose to agree to an introduction. Best regards, James James Wilcox Turbonomic <[[https://turbonomic.com/product/#lower-infrastructure-costs]]>C: (508) 479 7516 Email: james.wilcox@turbonomic.com <[[mailto:james.wilcox@turbonomic.com]]> Going to Cisco Live? Meet with a Turbonomic Executive <[[https://turbonomic.com/leadership-meetings]]>
